# lib-with-subs Usage Rules

This library demonstrates usage rules with sub-files.

## Overview

For detailed information, see the following sub-files:
- See ./usage_rules/async.md for async patterns
- See ./usage_rules/patterns/builder.md for builder pattern details

## Quick Start

```rust
use lib_with_subs::greet;

fn main() {
    greet();
}
```
